name: Everest's Summit
description:
Seven students at Emory University adventured out to develop a 2D platformer game for their Computer Science 370 course. Under the leadership of Professor Sandeep Madamanchi, they followed the agile framework and sprint format for the entirety of the semester and developed this game.

Summit aims to present a challenge for the gaming world, an intricate application purely for entertainment. Wander through the three worlds - Ice, Graveyard, and Lava - and discover new possibilities.
